mapper.insert: insert into reply (id, topicid, userid1, username1, userid2, username2, body, create_on) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{topicid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userid2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{body,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update reply set topicid = #{topicid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, userid1 = #{userid1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username1 = #{username1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userid2 = #{userid2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username2 = #{username2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, body = #{body,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_on = #{createOn,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, topicid, userid1, username1, userid2, username2, body, create_on from reply
